author: jsdelfino
msg: Added a variation of HelloWorldClient that doesn't use any Tuscany specific APIs, only the SCA spec standard programming model. Applied the same idea to calculator in a new calculator-lean module to show how this pattern works with just components (helloworld-ws-reference-lean used a reference with a WS binding). Also started to show how test cases can use the same pattern in calculator-lean.

author: gertv

author: gertv
msg: SM-1509: Add missing snapshot versions for xbean-kernel and -classloader to private repo
